rules_text:
Flying
Whenever an artifact you control becomes tapped, amass 2. [i](Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't have one, create a 0/0 black Army creature token first.)[/i]
Crew 4 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]
